summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Human Resources, authorizing an agreement with the United States of America, Department of Health, Education and Welfare for assistance to continue the Veterans' Talent Search and Upward Bound Program (Grant No. OEG-0-73-0306), increasing certain objects of expenditure in the 1973 Budget of said Department, making a reimbursable appropriation from the Emergency Fund, and declaring the emergency therefor.
